name: Memorial Circuit
description:
Memorial Circuit


"Memorial Circuit" is a text based visual novel game,
developed by Studio Elysian.

Memorial Circuit follows a scientist who lost his wife from a war, trying to bring her back to life. He participates in a secret research project to resurrect his wife, but as he progresses in his research he slowly falls into the conspiracy surrounding his company and the war.

Features

  • Genre : Sci-Fi + Romance
  • Playtime : 4~6 hrs of reading time
  • Story Route : Memorial Circuit follows a linear single-route storyline
  • Full 4K : Enjoy the game in its fullest visual quality

Various types of Collectable CGs

"Memorial Circuit" experiments with various visual graphics and effects such as Comics, Motion Graphics to maximize the story-reading experience for players.
